DOC.detailed_description: Investigators perform comprehensive ophthalmological examination , include evaluation risk factor ( immunosuppressive status , ocular trauma , previous ocular surgery , contact lens wear , topical corticosteroid use ) , best-corrected visual acuity ( Snellen chart ) , slit-lamp biomicroscopy , tonometry fundoscopy . In addition , anterior segment optical coherence tomography imaging ( Visante , Carl Zeiss Meditec , Dublin , California , USA ) , corneal scrape , culture clinical photograph day 1 , day 7 , month 1 3 analyze . Each participant assign one four group randomization . Group 1 : Initial ulcer treatment antibiotic plus sham ( n = 66 ) , partcipants receive topical moxifloxacin 0,5 % ( Vigamoxi , Alcon , Texas , USA ) sham CXL ; Group 2 : Initial ulcer treatment antibiotic plus cross-linking ( CXL ) ( n = 66 ) receive moxifloxacin plus CXL ( riboflavin 0.1 % 10 minute irradiation 30 mW/cm2 3 minute use accelerated CXL ) ; Group 3 : Refractory corneal ulcer treatment antibiotic plus sham ( n=66 ) , receive topical antibiotic plus sham CXL ; Group 4 : Refractory corneal ulcer treatment antibiotic plus CXL receive standard medication plus CXL . Statistical analysis divide four phase : 1 ) Analysis compliance , 2 ) Intention treat , 3 ) Losses follow-up 4 ) Variable-response ( heal ) use Stata/MP 12.0 ( Stata Corp. , College Station , TX ) .
